mapper.insert: insert into mer_bind_project_request (service, sign_type, sign, charset, merchant_id, version, project_id,project_name,project_amount,loan_user_id, request_url, request_data,request_time,status) values (#{service}, #{signType}, #{sign}, #{charset}, #{merchantId}, #{version}, #{projectId}, #{projectName}, #{projectAmount}, #{loanUserId}, #{requestUrl}, #{requestData}, #{requestTime}, #{status})
mapper.update: update mer_bind_project_request set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into mer_register_response (request_id, sign_type, sign, merchant_id, version, project_account_id, project_state, mer_check_date,ret_code,ret_msg,response_data,response_time) values (#{requestId}, #{signType}, #{sign}, #{merchantId}, #{version}, #{projectAccountId}, #{projectState}, #{merCheckDate}, #{retCode}, #{retMsg}, #{responseData}, #{responseTime})
